song.englishname: There Is Power in the Blood

english.segment1: Would you be free from the burden of sin?. There's pow'r in the blood;. Would you o'er evil a victory win?. There's pow'r in the blood. There's pow'r in the blood
english.segment2: There is pow'r, pow'r, wonder-working pow'r. In the blood of the Lamb;. There is pow'r, pow'r, wonder-working pow'r. In the precious blood of the Lamb.
english.segment3: Would you be free from your passion and pride?. There's pow'r in the blood;. Come for a cleansing to Calvary's tide;. There's pow'r in the blood. There's pow'r in the blood. There's pow'r in the blood. There's pow'r in the blood
english.segment4: There is pow'r, pow'r, wonder-working pow'r. In the blood of the Lamb;. There is pow'r, pow'r, wonder-working pow'r. In the precious blood of the Lamb.
english.segment5: Would you be whiter much whiter than snow?. There's pow'r in the blood;. Sin-stains are lost in its life-giving flow;. There's pow'r in the blood. There's pow'r in the blood. There's pow'r in the blood. There's pow'r in the blood
english.segment6: There is pow'r, pow'r, wonder-working pow'r. In the blood of the Lamb;. There is pow'r, pow'r, wonder-working pow'r. In the precious blood of the Lamb.
english.segment7: There is pow'r, pow'r, wonder-working pow'r. In the blood of the Lamb;. There is pow'r, pow'r, wonder-working pow'r. In the precious blood of the Lamb.
